column4: The specific purpose of performing flow cytometry assay. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.
The title of the kit/biologicals used.
date or a rough date when the assay was performed.
The biological context of the sample.
Device applied for the assay. If it is not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.
A list of performed method to ensure the health of the instrument .
Self-defined sample ID(s). Make sure it is the same when entering the sample metadata.
The species from which samples were derived.
When the list of staining information is stored in a file and uploaded in a shared folder or repository (e.g., ZENODO), please enter the path or the link.
A category header for the staining information if not stored as a file.
A list of the checks performed to ensure the data is reliable.
Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.
(For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.
Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
